localization_guidelines.formatting_notes: French uses longer text than English - ensure UI accommodates. Use formal 'vous' in customer service, can use 'tu' in casual marketing
localization_guidelines.review_process: Separate reviews needed for France and Quebec due to linguistic differences and local regulations

market_specific.pet_ownership_stats: 63% of French households own pets, with 7.5 million dogs and 15 million cats
market_specific.cultural_pet_preferences: Very strong emotional bonds with pets, growing humanization trend, pets increasingly considered family members
market_specific.local_regulations: Strict GDPR compliance, French data protection laws, pet identification requirements
market_specific.competitor_landscape: Limited French-localized pet tracking solutions, opportunity for market leadership
